title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI). Chat-like interface, model management, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API for chat, generate, pull, list, delete, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, generate, embed, and manage models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ with async streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama; typed API for chat, generate, pull, list, delete, and embeddings.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; idiomatic Go API with context support and streaming.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker images and compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm) deployments of Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build RAG pipelines with Ollama embeddings and LangChain in a single Docker compose.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot that integrates Ollama models into channels via socket mode and slash commands.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for Ollama; 40k+ weekly downloads.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official Python package on PyPI; install via pip and chat with local models in 2 lines of code.
